item.title: 03/14/2019: Inaugural Post
item.description: This is my inaugural first post of the Snippets page, and I figured I would kick it off in a clich√© way: “Hello World”! Although this is not my first time writing code, this is my first successful attempt at creating a website for myself. I have actually tried doing something like this since Fall 2016; all my attempts have been quashed by some technical issue or lack of motivation on my end.
